00034 void generate_test_harness(int argc, char *argv[]);

00039 class harness_generator : public parsed_tests
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     /*virtual*/ ~harness_generator();
00043     harness_generator(const std::string& file_name);
00044 
00045     virtual void add_file(const std::string& name);
00046     virtual void add_class(const std::string& name);
00047     virtual void add_test(const std::string& name);
00048 
00049 private:
00050     std::string m_includes;
00051     std::string m_main;
00052     std::ofstream m_file;
00053     std::ostream* m_output_p;
00054     std::string m_current_class;
00055     std::string m_current_instance;
00056 
00057     void finish_previous_class();
00058 };
00059 
00063 class test_files
00064 {
00065 public:
00066     test_files(const std::vector<std::string>& files);
00067 
00068     void read_from(const std::string& file_name);
00069     void read_from(std::istream& input);
00070     void parse(const std::string& harness_name);
00071 
00072     bool empty() const;
00073 
00074 private:
00075     std::vector<std::string> m_test_files;
00076 };

00078 inline
00079 void
00080 generate_test_harness(int argc, char *argv[])
00081 {
00082     try
00083     {
00084         TCLAP::CmdLine cmd("FRUCTOSE test harness generator", ' ', "0.1");
00085         TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> input_arg("i", 
00086                                                "input", 
00087                                                "File listing test files",
00088                                                false,
00089                                                "",
00090                                                "path",
00091                                                cmd);
00092         TCLAP::ValueArg<std::string> output_arg("o",
00093                                                 "output",
00094                                                 "File name for the harness",
00095                                                 false,
00096                                                 "",
00097                                                 "path",
00098                                                 cmd);
00099         TCLAP::UnlabeledMultiArg<std::string> test_files_arg("files",
00100                                                              "Test files",
00101                                                              false,
00102                                                              "path(s)",
00103                                                              cmd);
00104         cmd.parse(argc, argv);
00105 
00106         const std::string& input_file = input_arg.getValue();
00107         const std::string& harness_name = output_arg.getValue();
00108         test_files files(test_files_arg.getValue());
00109 
00110         if (!input_file.empty())
00111         {
00112             files.read_from(input_file);
00113         }
00114         if (files.empty())
00115         {
00116             files.read_from(std::cin);
00117         }
00118         files.parse(harness_name);
00119     }
00120     catch (const TCLAP::ArgException& exception)
00121     {
00122         std::cerr << exception.error()
00123             << " for argument " << exception.argId() << std::endl;
00124     }
00125 }
00126 
00127 inline
00128 harness_generator::~harness_generator()
00129 {
00130     finish_previous_class();
00131     *m_output_p << m_includes << "\n" << m_main << std::endl
00132                 << "    return retval;\n}\n";
00133 }
00134 
00135 inline
00136 harness_generator::harness_generator(const std::string& file_name)
00137     : m_main("#include <stdlib.h>\n\n"
00138              "int main(int argc, char *argv[])\n{\n"
00139              "    int retval = EXIT_SUCCESS;\n")
00140 {
00141     if (file_name.empty())
00142     {
00143         m_output_p = &std::cout;
00144     }
00145     else
00146     {
00147         m_file.open(file_name.c_str());
00148         if (m_file)
00149         {
00150             m_output_p = &m_file;
00151         }
00152         else
00153         {
00154             std::cerr << "Failed to open " << file_name
00155                 << "; redirecting to standard output" << std::endl;
00156             m_output_p = &std::cout;
00157         }
00158     }
00159 }
00160 
00161 inline
00162 void 
00163 harness_generator::add_file(const std::string& name)
00164 {
00165     m_includes += "#include \"";
00166     m_includes += name;
00167     m_includes += "\"\n";
00168 }
00169 
00170 inline
00171 void 
00172 harness_generator::add_class(const std::string& name)
00173 {
00174     finish_previous_class();
00175     m_current_class = name;
00176     m_current_instance = name + "_instance";
00177     m_main += "    {\n        ";
00178     m_main += m_current_class;
00179     m_main += " ";
00180     m_main += m_current_instance;
00181     m_main += ";\n";
00182 }
00183 
00184 inline
00185 void 
00186 harness_generator::add_test(const std::string& name)
00187 {
00188     m_main += "        ";
00189     m_main += m_current_instance;
00190     m_main += ".add_test(\"";
00191     m_main += name;
00192     m_main += "\", &";
00193     m_main += m_current_class;
00194     m_main += "::";
00195     m_main += name;
00196     m_main += ");\n";
00197 }
00198 
00199 inline
00200 void 
00201 harness_generator::finish_previous_class()
00202 {
00203     if (!m_current_instance.empty())
00204     {
00205         m_main += "        retval = ";
00206         m_main += m_current_instance;
00207         m_main += ".run(argc, argv);\n    }\n";
00208     }
00209 }

00211 inline
00212 test_files::test_files(const std::vector<std::string>& files)
00213     : m_test_files(files)
00214 {
00215 }
00216 
00217 inline 
00218 void
00219 test_files::read_from(const std::string& file_name)
00220 {
00221     std::ifstream input(file_name.c_str());
00222     if (input)
00223     {
00224         read_from(input);
00225     }
00226     else
00227     {
00228         std::cerr << "Could not open input file "
00229             << file_name << std::endl;
00230     }
00231 }
00232 
00233 inline
00234 void
00235 test_files::read_from(std::istream& input)
00236 {
00237     while (!input.eof())
00238     {
00239         std::string test_file;
00240         input >> test_file;
00241         if (!test_file.empty())
00242         {
00243             m_test_files.push_back(test_file);
00244         }
00245     }
00246 }
00247 
00248 inline
00249 void
00250 test_files::parse(const std::string& harness_name)
00251 {
00252     harness_generator generator(harness_name);
00253     fructose::parse(m_test_files, generator);
00254 }
00255 
00256 inline
00257 bool
00258 test_files::empty() const
00259 {
00260     return m_test_files.empty();
00261 }
00262 
00263 }
